node.doctext: Sure the world is running out of [fossil fuel]s. But we still have to get to the [nodermeet]s, and it's best to do it quickly. We're the [gearheads] of everything2, and we like [car]s, [classic car]s, [racing car]s, and more cars. If you love the automobile and noding, we want you!
node.title: gearheads
